page.title: 16EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTIONS
page.content: In the area there are many different educational institutions: primary, secondary, special schools, indepen- dent primary and secondary schools and adult training colleges. PRIMARY SCHOOLS {Coombe Hill Infants and Junior {Schools}are in Coombe Lane West, Kingston-upon -Thames. The school uniform colours are grey, white and blue. {Corpus Christi}is a combined Infants and Junior School with a nursery class so it takes children between 3 and ll years. It is a voluntary aided Roman Catholic school situated in Chestnut Grove, New Malden. The school uniform colours are grey, white and maroon. {Christ Church Infants and Junior {Schools}are voluntary aided Church of England ones. The school uniform colours are white, grey and yellow.
